# Codebase

Each GitHub repository for an individual component of the _ICJIA Research Hub_project contains a CONTRIBUTING.md file. Please find each CONTRIBUTING.md file by clicking the following:

  • Research Hub
  • Research Hub API
  • Research Hub component library
  • Research Hub Documentation
  • Research Hub Preview
  • Research Hub Studio

NOTE

See the Project Architecture page of this document for more on each components.
